verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6872>Zeror,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1064>Becorath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H647>Aphiah,<s%> the son of a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

He had a <S%H1121>son,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> an <S%H2896>impressive<s%> young <S%H970>man;<s%> and there was not among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> than <S%H7926>he.<s%> From his shoulders and <S%H4605>upward<s%> he was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than any of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H860>donkeys<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1>father,<s%> were <S%H6>lost.<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> now <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with <S%H6965>you,<s%> and arise, <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>donkeys.<s%>"

He passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8031>Shalishah,<s%> but they <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find <S%H5674>them:<s%> then they passed through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8171>Shaalim,<s%> and there they <S%H5674>weren't<s%> there: and he passed through the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites,<s%> but they <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find them.

When they had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%> who was with <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Come, and let us <S%H7725>return,<s%> lest my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2308>stop<s%> caring about the <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> and be anxious for <S%H1672>us.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5892>him,<s%> "See now, there is in this city a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and he is a <S%H376>man<s%> who is held in <S%H3513>honor.<s%> All that he <S%H1696>says<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> surely to <S%H935>pass.<s%> Now let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H5046>there.<s%> Perhaps he can tell us concerning our <S%H1870>journey<s%> whereon we <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H3212>"But,<s%> behold, if we go, what shall we <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H376>man?<s%> For the <S%H3899>bread<s%> is <S%H235>spent<s%> in our <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and there is not a <S%H8670>present<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> What do we have?"

The <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> <S%H4672>"Behold,<s%> I have in my <S%H3027>hand<s%> the fourth <S%H7253>part<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> that to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> us our <S%H1870>way.<s%>"

(In earlier times in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> thus he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H7200>seer;<s%>" for he who is <S%H3117>now<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H7200>Seer.<s%>)

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1697>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2896>"Well<s%> <S%H559>said.<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> let us <S%H3212>go.<s%>" So they <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> where the <S%H376>man<s%> of God <S%H430>was.<s%>

As they went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> young <S%H5291>maidens<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3426>them,<s%> "Is the seer <S%H7200>here?<s%>"

They <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6030>them,<s%> and said, "He <S%H3426>is.<s%> <S%H3426>Behold,<s%> he is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4116>you.<s%> Hurry <S%H935>now,<s%> for he has come <S%H3117>today<s%> into the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for the people have a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place.<s%>

As soon as you have <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> you shall <S%H3651>immediately<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H5927>him,<s%> before he goes up to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> to <S%H398>eat;<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> will not <S%H398>eat<s%> until he <S%H935>come,<s%> because he <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%> <S%H310>Afterwards<s%> those who are <S%H7121>invited<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%> Now therefore go <S%H5927>up;<s%> for at this <S%H3117>time<s%> you shall find <S%H4672>him.<s%>"

They went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8432>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%> As they <S%H935>came<s%> within the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H8050>behold,<s%> Samuel came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>toward<s%> <S%H5927>them,<s%> to go up to the high <S%H1116>place.<s%>
Now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1540>revealed<s%> <S%H241>to<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> for I have <S%H7200>looked<s%> on my <S%H5971>people,<s%> because their <S%H6818>cry<s%> has come to <S%H935>me.<s%>"

When <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Behold, the man of whom I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H6113>you!<s%> this same shall have authority over my <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H335>where<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%>'s house <S%H1004>is.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H7200>seer.<s%> Go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to the high <S%H1116>place,<s%> for you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> with me <S%H3117>today.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you all that is in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

As for your <S%H860>donkeys<s%> who were <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3117>ago,<s%> <S%H7760>don't<s%> set your <S%H3820>mind<s%> on <S%H4672>them;<s%> for they are found. For whom is all that is <S%H2532>desirable<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Is it not for <S%H1>you,<s%> and for all your father's <S%H1004>house?<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "Am I not a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of the <S%H6996>smallest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> And my <S%H4940>family<s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%> Why then do you <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me like <S%H1697>this?<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the guest <S%H3957>room,<s%> and made them <S%H5414>sit<s%> in the <S%H7218>best<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> among those who were <S%H7121>invited,<s%> who were about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>persons.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2876>cook,<s%> <S%H5414>"Bring<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> of which I said to <S%H7760>you,<s%> 'Set it aside.'"

The <S%H2876>cook<s%> took <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7785>thigh,<s%> and that which was on <S%H7760>it,<s%> and set it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> Samuel <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7604>"Behold,<s%> that which has been reserved! <S%H7760>Set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> yourself and <S%H398>eat;<s%> because for the appointed <S%H4150>time<s%> has it been <S%H8104>kept<s%> for <S%H559>you,<s%> for I said, <S%H7121><s%> 'I have invited the <S%H5971>people.<s%>'" So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> with <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%>
When they had come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetop.<s%>

They arose <S%H7925>early:<s%> and it happened about the <S%H5927>spring<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetop,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Get <S%H6965>up,<s%> that I may send you <S%H7971>away.<s%>" <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of <S%H8050>them,<s%> he and Samuel, <S%H2351>abroad.<s%>

As they were going <S%H3381>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>us<s%>" (and he passed on), "but <S%H5975>stand<s%> still <S%H3117>first,<s%> that I may cause you to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>"
